reviews.review: It is fun and amazing. A digital masterpiece.
JEU MYTHIQUE rien a rajouter il na rien a envier au jeu actuel
It's a classic with fantastic level design and simple gameplay made during a time where DLC, always online, and games as a service weren't the norm.

Ah yes this is the true best game of all time, Half-life 2. This was the sequel we got to an amazing fps that focused on aliens invading our world, and this one focuses on aliens controlling our world. This great game takes the FPS genre and mixes it with some humor, action, horror, and dystopia. I actually don't know what to say about this other than it's one of the greatest games of all time because everyone else has said everything else. A clear 12/10 no more needs to be said, although I can't count past 2 anymore, so thank you valve for rubbing off on me.

half life 2 is a 10/10 game both the lore and combat are good i LOVE it!

I personally think this is a game that everybody should try because of the way the game is crafted. 

The story is not only told to you, but also shown to you in a way that you always feel that you are directly part of it, because you are the very core of the story, everything you do in the game contributes directly to the story which is what makes it feel very “boots on the ground”

Almost every item lying around in the game, from barrels to wooden crates can be moved around by you, which, while revolutionary at the time still makes you feel very connected to the game’s world.

Each level is carefully crafted and always teaches you a new mechanic for you to exploit against the enemies, from using barrels to keep Barnacles that might pull you into death busy, or using a Combine’s own grenade against him, the opportunities are endless.

Just when you are getting tired of the confines of the city, the game opens up into a large open area for you to experience. You are always encouraged to explore each map to find hidden caches or crates hidden around the area that contain items helpful to your journey to the next area.

The game introduces to you new mechanics or enemies to you in a safe environment before slowly letting you transition into more tricky scenarios to allow you to make use of your newfound knowledge or weapons. 

Everything you learn can always be used in nearly every scenario, there is never a weapon in the game where I’ve found to be useless as the game allows you to approach nearly every scenario the way you want.

I highly recommend anybody to try this game out at least once, and if you do have interest in getting it, wait till the Orange Box bundle is discounted to like a dollar, it is a great bundle as it also comes with Episode 1 and 2.

Это тот случай, когда продолжение той самой первой Half-Life удается на все 100%.
Даже спустя 10+ лет после того, как вышел Half-Life 2, он до сих пор остается визуально приятен для игры, а глубокий сюжет в купе с довольно детальным миром заставляет не вылазить из этой игры, до момента когда ты ее прошел, а когда прошел, остаешься в маленьком шоке от происходящего.
Если вы были или остаетесь фанатом компании Valve, то обязательно приобретете игру по скидке, причем все эпизоды, они в сумме не знаю как у кого, но в Украине это вышло в 40+ грн, то вам определенно стоит поиграть в нее, потому что, это одна из последних игр, в которую хочется играть и которую никакими патчами как Доту/Андерлордс/Артифакт не убить.
One of the best FPS games out there. It's even more fun than the first one !

Now, Half-Life 2, the game that introduced the Source engine and one of the most influential games ever. Half-Life 2 is one of the best games the PC platform has to offer, and I'd say maybe even one of the best video games ever. After your defeat with Nihilanth in the first game, the Combine have taken over the Earth and you're now helping the Resistance battle against them. Half-Life 2 is fun in so many ways since it has so many fun enemies and fun challenges and just feels like a truly great sequel to the first Half-Life. However I do have some minor "complaints" and that is: 1. It's shorter and easier (well for me at least) than the first Half-Life, and 2. You can't store as much ammo in your weapons like the first game (magnums and shotguns could carry up to 36 and 125 rounds respectively in the first game and yet magnums and shotguns here can carry up to 12 and 30 rounds at most; but limited ammunition does allow for a bigger challenge of saving ammo). However the key word here is "minor" as these things do not remove from the experience from the game. Overall, HL2 is a great game and a definite recommend for any players that are new to the PC platform. P.S. I wouldn't call HL2 an actual horror game but just remember: "We DON'T GO to Ravenholm"
